name: MercuryCorporation
description:
You are a scientist of the largest corporation in ████ In order to keep this going you have to work examining strange and even paranormal objects. It seems absurd but they pay well... Controls
WASD - move
E - interaction
CTRL - crouching
LSHIFT - sprint
MOUSE WHEEL - zoom
If you like this game I recommend you: https://store.steampowered.com/app/568220/Lobotomy_Corporation__Monster_Manageme... and https://www.scpcbgame.com/
